metadata.title: CVE-2019-20445 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
HttpObjectDecoder.java in Netty before 4.1.44 allows a Content-Lengthheader to be accompanied by a second Content-Length header, or by aTransfer-Encoding header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20445` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnetty-3.9-java - 3.9.0.Final-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netty package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
netty-3.9 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.9.0.Final-1ubuntu0.1').
